Who we are

We are Indian Registered Hosting company dedicated to better support and service for our clients & we do provide " Domain name services, Linux/windows Hosting, Dedicated server, OpenVz and KVM VPS etc". Our KVM Hypervisor are rented with Server Mania at Buffalo, New York (US East) DC. Node contains Intel Xeon E3-1240 v3, 1 Gbps Connection, Enterprise SATA (WD RE4) disk, with 99.9% uptime.

VPS Features

Each KVM VPS comes with the following features:

  • SolusVM control panel
  • 1Gbps fair share port speed
  • Fair share RAM
  • Multiple Linux OS templates
  • 99.9% uptime guaranteed
  • Unlimited OS reinstall
  • Free setup


Why US?

  • 24*7*365 Technical support
  • Live chat support
  • No Oversold Node
  • Instant Activation
  • Affordable Prices
  • 3 days Money Back Guarantee.


Here our offer exclusively for VPS BOARD readers/users.

KVM- 512 MB VPS

RAM 512 MB

CPU core 4

Swap 512 MB

Disk space 20 Gb

1 ipv4 address

Bandwidth 1TB

Promo Code : vpsboard

Price $7.0/month

Order Now

FAQ’s

(1) How long does VPS setup take?

All vps server provisioned instantly after receiving first payment. Short delay may occur if we are out of stock.

(2) How billing handled ?

We accept payment monthly,quarterly,semi annually and annually duration.

(3) What is test ip ?

Kindly use this ip address for network ping test : 138.128.0.7

(4) How we accept payment ?

We accept payment via PayPal, skrill and credit/debit card via CCAvenue.

For more information visit our website “https://pnshostings.com” or contact our live chat help desk.
